amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for any conference (as described in the Office of Management and Budget memorandum M-12-12, "Promoting Efficient Spending to Support Agency Operations", dated May 11, 2012) for which the cost to the agency exceeds $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
